name: @architect/functions
description: Cloud function signatures for HTTP handlers, pub/sub + scheduled, queued functions, table triggers, and more

scripts.test:unit: cross-env PORT=6666 NODE_ENV=testing AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=foo AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=bar AWS_REGION=us-west-1 tape 'test/unit/**/*-test.js' | tap-spec
scripts.test:integration: cross-env PORT=6666 NODE_ENV=testing AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=foo AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=bar AWS_REGION=us-west-1 tape 'test/integration/**/*-test.js' | tap-spec
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:integration && npm run coverage
scripts.bundle: echo 'For experimentation only, build from http-proxy!' && browserify src/http/proxy/arc-default-get-index.js --node --external aws-sdk --standalone proxy > dist.js

author: Brian LeRoux <b@brian.io>
